desc: It is implied by the phenomenon of conversion that some words hold multiple parts of speech. That is to say, these multi-part-of-speech words might confuse the language models in terms of POS tagging. Accordingly, we replace verbs with words holding multiple parts of speech.

examples.ori: The bill intends to restrict the RTC to Treasury borrowings only
examples.trans: The bill intends to tattoo the RTC to Treasury borrowings only

examples.ori: It is likely to sell or merge 600 by the time the bailout concludes
examples.trans: It is likely to sell or ransom 600 by the time the bailout concludes
